resources.string: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again.
Playback over mobile data is not enabled!
Playback will resume when the app reconnects.
This artist\'s url is not available!
I\'m listening to %1$s by %2$s on Arcanos Web Rock! Get the app at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.developercity.arcanosradio - arcanosmc.com.br #ArcanosWebRock
Please check your connection and/or preferences.
Keep screen on (this will decrease battery life)

This app was developed by: 

 Filipe Belatti 
 fibelatti@gmail.com 
 github.com/fibelatti 

 and 

 Luiz Barbosa 
 luiz@developercity.de 
 github.com/luizmb 

 It is intended to promote Arcanos Web Rock online radio, commanded by Jair Barbosa, member of Arcanos Motoclube.
